mapper.select: SELECT p.name, p.perms FROM `sys_permission` AS p, `sys_role_permission` AS rp, `sys_role` AS r, `sys_user_role` AS ur, `sys_user` AS u WHERE p.id = rp.permission_id AND r.id = rp.role_id AND r.id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = u.id AND p.status = 1 AND p.menu_type = 2 AND p.perms_type = 1 AND u.username = #{userName}
